question:
GRE Hard and Tricky Verbal Practice: NEW Questions Daily
"Can You Solve These Tricky GRE Text Completion Questions?"
"New Challenging Verbal Questions – Explanations & Debate Welcome!"
"Hidden Clues in GRE Text Completion: Let’s Break Them Down!"
Hey everyone! Let’s test our verbal reasoning skills with these challenging Text Completion questions. Read each sentence carefully, choose the best word(s) for the blank(s), and explain your reasoning.
Which blank was harder to solve? Why?
Did any options trick you? (e.g., "controversy" might seem plausible!)
Share your strategy for tackling such questions!
